amendment.description: An amendment numbered 8 printed in Part B of House Report 116-392 to strike the bill's provisions that allow intermittent strikes and the provisions that make it illegal for employers to replace striking workers permanently.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 8 printed in Part B of House Report 116-392 to strike the bill's provisions that allow intermittent strikes and the provisions that make it illegal for employers to replace striking workers permanently.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Keller amendment (A008) Failed by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A008) offered by Mr. Keller.
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Keller amendment (A008) Failed by voice vote.
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
